name: Machines Force
description:
Machines Force is a shooting game and the player has the ability to freely move horizontally and vertically. The player can collect power-ups, which award additional HP Recovery, additional Score and Speed up or special weapons. To collect the Power ups you can defeat the Enemy or other player and to become the strongest tank on the battle field.

Note: if you use keyboard you can disable the Virtual joystick by Clicking Backspace. To Move it you can use (W,A,S,D) and to fire (L) button.
